name: Holy Grail Max
details:
Spring, Hall, Plate and Reverse ReverbThe Holy Grail Max shares the Holy Grail’s remarkable Spring and Hall reverbs. Then we added a Plate reverb, with its wonderfully lush tone, and Reverse reverb for the sonically adventurous. The Max’s multi-function control lets you adjust decay or reverse time.
https://www.ehx.com/products/holy-grail-max
